statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-3 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 5 , 6 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x + 14 , 2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 4 , 3 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + x + 3 , 2 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
